title: Inverters with separation
fullText:
For inverters, which provide separation/isolation (on both a.c. output and inverter controls) between the d.c. input and the LV a.c. output, the following shall apply:
(a) The a.c. output may be connected to a MEN-configured main (installation) switchboard or operated as a separated (isolated) supply.
(b) The d.c input may be left floating or be earthed on one side.
NOTE: Consult the manufacturer's instructions for acceptable configurations
